body_html:
Inferring input/output devices requires a fair amount of static analysis that is simply not possible to perform in Python. I have no idea how would we implement such a feature.

The default is not a good idea. This reflects most common cases, but is not guaranteed to be correct. This means that having it in the library would only be confusing. We don't make any assumptions about user code.

body:
Inferring input/output devices requires a fair amount of static analysis that is simply not possible to perform in Python. I have no idea how would we implement such a feature.

The default is not a good idea. This reflects most common cases, but is not guaranteed to be correct. This means that having it in the library would only be confusing. We don't make any assumptions about user code.
